summary: Strengthens customer due diligence for VASPs with mandatory biometric verification for transactions over $10,000 KYD, enhanced screening against OFAC and UN sanctions lists, and real-time transaction monitoring. Introduces a 48-hour suspicious transaction reporting window to FRA.

First-of-its-kind regulation requiring DeFi protocols operating through Cayman entities to implement governance frameworks, including admin key management, smart contract audit requirements, and investor protection mechanisms. CIMA supervision applies.

Mandates reporting of all cross-border crypto transfers above $5,000 KYD to the Tax Information Authority. Implements the OECD Common Reporting Standard for digital assets with automatic information exchange with partner jurisdictions.
